paper_abstract: AFTER A DECADE-LONG DORMANCY, INTEREST IN NEAR-DATA PROCESSING (NDP) HAS SPIKED. A WORKSHOP ON NDP WAS ORGANIZED AT MICRO-46 AND WAS WELL ATTENDED. GIVEN THE INTEREST, THE ORGANIZERS AND KEYNOTE SPEAKERS HAVE ATTEMPTED TO CAPTURE THE KEY INSIGHTS FROM THE WORKSHOP FOR WIDER DISSEMINATION. THIS ARTICLE DESCRIBES WHY NDP IS COMPELLING TODAY AND IDENTIFIES UPCOMING CHALLENGES IN REALIZING ITS POTENTIAL.
paper_title: NEAR-DATA PROCESSING: INSIGHTS FROM A MICRO-46 WORKSHOP
